If grape-gatherers \w came|strong="H7843"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w thee|strong="H7604"\w*, would \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* \w some|strong="H5955"\w* \w gleaning|strong="H5955"\w* \w grapes|strong="H5955"\w*? if \w thieves|strong="H1590"\w* \w by|strong="H3915"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, would \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* till \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H1767"\w* \w enough|strong="H1767"\w*?
